response_json.message: Execute command: 'figlet -c Digital Privacy Awareness' in the terminal to create a large banner highlighting the importance of digital privacy. This task aligns with the project plan for raising awareness and educating users.

Project plan from Layer 4 for conducting audience analysis received and reviewed. Task sequence for the digital privacy awareness campaign is set. Initiating 'figlet' command to create an informative banner as per the directive. Monitoring task execution for success criteria fulfillment.
